ModMetaData.name: Tank Beds (Fast Sleep)
ModMetaData.author: Tremeloe
ModMetaData.description:
Add a Tank Bed. Tree hours inside of him refreshing as a full 8 hours of sleep.
COSTS • 220 Steel • 5 Advanced Component • 1 Glitterworld Medicine • 9 skill in Construct • MultiAnalyzer research
PROS • Require just 3 hours of sleep per day • Don't need electricity • Is very cool
CONS • Very ugly • Uncomfortable • Don't heal • Bad for surgeries
COMPABILITIES Works fine with other mods and existent saves
